about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a software engineering student passionate about technology and innovation. I have experience in fullstack development, embedded systems, and robotics, focusing on creating efficient and scalable solutions. I am constantly seeking to improve my skills and contribute to projects that positively impact society.

project1.title: Extension Project Carpoeira Baja – UFBA (2019 – 2022)
project1.text: Development of an off-road vehicle, including conception, design, prototyping, assembly, and competition. Responsible for the design of a distributed embedded system using ESP32, communication via CAN protocol, and LoRa telemetry.

project2.title: Scientific Research: Robotic Localization based on Perfect Match – UFBA (2022 – 2023)
project2.text: Study and improvement of the Perfect Match algorithm using the UGV Husky. Development of computational tools and virtual environments for simulations.

graduation.title: Degree
graduation.text: Software Engineering - Catholic University of Salvador (2025 - expected graduation: 06/2029)

course1.title: Fullstack Programming Course – SENAC
details: Content: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, PHP, Laravel
Final project: Website for cataloging events happening in Salvador, aiming to help promote them for bars, restaurants, and event venues.

course2.title: Advanced English Course – Fisk
details: Content: Advanced English communication, academic writing, fluent conversation, and preparation for professional contexts.
Took the Michigan English Test, achieving a B2 score.
